title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 84.11 - Record of attendance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 84.11 - Record of attendance

State Regulations

All employees are required to maintain a daily record of absences and time and leave credits earned and used in accordance with these rules. A daily record of attendance shall be maintained during the period covered by the school calendar and for any periods during which an employee may receive compensation which is in addition to his regular salary. Notes

84.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
